short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to help you learn vocabulary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is designed to help users learn English vocabulary in a more efficient and enjoyable way. By providing instant word meanings and a notebook feature, users can easily look up the meaning of words they encounter while surfing the web and save them for later review. The extension also allows users to share their vocabulary notebook with others, making it a great tool for language learners and educators. 

Features:
    -   Instant word lookup: Double-click on any word to see its meaning in a pop-up.
    -   Vocabulary notebook: Save words to your notebook for later review.
    -   Share notebook: Share your vocabulary notebook with others.
    -   Review mode: Review your saved words automatically as you surf the web.
